name: hashbrown-cms
description: A free and open-source headless CMS

scripts.start:docker: npm run build:frontend && cd ./docker && sudo docker-compose up --build -d
scripts.watch:docker: cd ./docker && sudo docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.watch.yml up --build -d && sudo docker-compose logs -f node
scripts.db:docker: cd ./docker && sudo docker-compose exec mongodb mongo
scripts.update: git pull && git submodule update --recursive --init && npm install && npm run build:frontend

author: Putaitu
